title: Destiny by Design- Leah's Journey
description: Leah Abramovitz, a cossetted member of the upper echelons of Odessan society, has high hopes for a brilliant futureâ€”that is until Fate takes a hand. When confronted with alarming changes in political and societal mores, the family decide to flee and chart a course that will forever alter their lives. Will her dreams be washed away on the shores of Buenos Aires or will Leah finally achieve the freedom to design her own destiny?
author: Mirta Ines Trupp
